index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services and the Police Department; authorizing agreements with the State of Washington Office of Crime Victims Advocacy and the Office of the King County Prosecutor for continued financial assistance in the operation of programs and services to address domestic violence; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1997 budgets of said departments; extending a position; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Health, Housing, Human Services, Education and Libraries
